meanings.sent1: Leaves left on the ground too long will putrefy and turn into mush.
meanings.sent2: If you leave food out for too long, it will putrefy and start to smell bad.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich in the backpack putrefied into a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: Neglect can cause relationships to putrefy, just like fruit left out in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had a musty smell, as if it were beginning to putrefy.

meanings.sent4: Time can putrefy memories, fading them like old photographs.
meanings.sent5: The once vibrant colors of the painting began to putrefy, losing their brightness.
